div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Check our News Feed for the district, primary and secondary grade level plans for online learning as set forth by the governor.

Board of Education Meeting on Monday, April 20, 2020, 6:00 pm. will be held online via Zoom.
Access to zoom meeting:

Enjoy today's Read Aloud from Mrs. Lillie, second grade teacher at Kincheloe, as she reads
Rubia and the Three Osos, written by Susan Middleton Elya and illustrated by Michelle Sweet. Permission granted by Scholastic Books.
https://youtu.be/NzcxrXG137Q

Hello parents, as part of the DUS plan for remote learning teachers will be calling your students to connect and get information to you. In this, you may get a call from a "Restricted" number. Please accept as this may be your teacher trying to connect.

Happy Friday, here's a Read Aloud from Mrs. Daiga. Enjoy Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day written by Judith Viorst, illustrated by Ray Cruz, with permission from Scholastic books.
https://youtu.be/LJmVnwE4nI8
